metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8312 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Off-by-one error in afs_pioctl.c in OpenAFS before 1.6.16 might allow localusers to cause a denial of service (memory overwrite and system crash) viaa pioctl with an input buffer size of 4096 bytes.

criterions.comment: openafs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
